Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: Discover The Ritz-Carlton, Istanbul. Featuring a relaxing spa, world-class dining and impeccable service, this five-star luxury hotel in Istanbul is an unforgettable retreat. Experience the trip of a lifetime when you stay at The Ritz-Carlton, Istanbul.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: The Ritz-Carlton Istanbul is located in the heart of Istanbul, in the prestigious Dolmabahce area overlooking the Bosphorus and with many of the city's cultural attractions within walking distance. The Ataturk Airport is 30 minutes by car. The hotel offers 243 rooms, including 21 Suites, 39 Ritz-Carlton Club rooms, 1 Ritz-Carlton Suite. The meeting facilities consist of 5 meeting rooms, 1 boardroom, and a ballroom that divides into 3 sections. Dining facilities are Atelier Real Food for dinner, Atelier LOUNGE for breakfast & lunch, BLEU Lounge & Grill for cocktails and light snacks and Living Lounge featuring warm and relaxing athmosphere. The hotel will also feature a Turkish "Hamam", a spa and fitness center with swimming pool. The Ritz-Carlton Istanbul caters to today's traveler with amenities including high-speed internet access and the services of a technology butler.

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: City center location within walking distance to major historical sites and minutes to the convention center.

Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Take the Airport exit and turn to first right intersection and follow the signs for the Sirkeci/Sahilyolu Avenue (parallel to the coast line). After approximately 15 km make a left from Yenikapi round towards the Taksim signs. Keep straight to Taksim, which is 5 km away. After getting to the Taksim Square follow signs towards Besiktas, The Ritz-Carlton, Istanbul is located on the right hand side above the stadium.

Message Text
Description.Text: Discover the only Open Air Spa in the city, over looking the Bosphorus

Description.Name: Value proposition 1
Description.Text: Located on the shores of the Bosphorus on the European side, in walking distance to major business districts. Very close to the fashionable shopping areas and malls. The International Atatrk Airport is approx. 30 minutes away.

Description.Name: Value proposition 2
Description.Text: Full service multi-lingual concierge, State-of-the-art business centre, offering secretarial support and services including high-speed wireless internet access, data port connections, dual line telephones, faxing, photo copying and courier service

Description.Name: Value proposition 3
Description.Text: The Club Lounge on the 12th floor of The Ritz-Carlton, Istanbul, offers guests wonderful elevated views as well as a unique level of privileges, including an exclusive food and drink service five times a day and high-speed Wi-Fi. Newly renovated to offer

Description.Name: Sales strategy
Description.Text: The Ritz-Carlton, Istanbul is based on the shores of the Bosphorus in the heart of Istanbul just a 30-minute drive from Atatrk International Airport and a short stroll from Taksim Square, historic Sultanahmet, Niantass fashionable shopping district and Beyolus vibrant nightlife. Also, the hotel offers a total of 2,403 square meters of meeting space including a 695-square-metre Ballroom combined with 199 Bosphorus View and 44 Park View rooms.
